text: "How Blue" is a 1984 song by country singer Reba McEnitre and is the leading single to her eighth studio album My Kind of Country. It went to number 1 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart and number 6 on the Canadian Country Tracks chart. ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Country songs Category:Reba McEntire songs Category:Dolly Parton songs
title: How Blue
